schema.name: Healthyfied Binakol

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: finely chop the garlic, slice the green onions, dice the white onion, slice the ginger, and shred the coconut meat.
In a large pot, combine the whole chicken, sliced ginger, chopped garlic, diced white onion, and lemon grass. Pour in the coconut water, and season with salt and black pepper.
Bring the pot to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 45 minutes or until the chicken is fully cooked.
Add the shredded coconut meat and sliced green onions. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes.

schema.description: This Healthyfied Binakol recipe is your ticket to a delicious, low-carb, and low-sugar meal, featuring the savory combination of whole chicken with the tropical flavors of coconut. Ideal for those looking for healthy recipes without compromising taste.
